https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rjUVnC6itSxUPFHNQJR7LAucIiR.jpg In order to cheer up recently divorced Chloe, her friend, Sam gives her a giant teddy bear, Bearry. As Chloe confides her wishes to Bearry, people close to her go missing or die. Is Chloe a murderer, is it her stalker? or is it Bearry? Bearry
